title: Police: Shooting Near Gonzales Gardens
content:
Columbia, SC (WLTX) Columbia Police are investigating a shooting Thursday night near Gonzales Gardens Apartments.
According to Columbia Police Department spokesperson Jennifer Timmons the call came in around 9:30PM and happened on McDuffie Avenue.
No word yet on any injuries, but investigators and crime scene detectives are on the scene.
If you have any information you are encouraged to call CrimeStoppers at 1-888-CrimeSC.
